actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a gradual increase in the rate of pay of certain offices and positions in the executive and judicial branches, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Raises salaries in ten percent increments over four years beginning January 1, 1990, for: (1) the Vice President; (2) Federal judges, including Supreme Court justices, and certain judicial branch personnel; (3) U.S. Postal Service Board of Governors members; and (4) certain Executive Schedule officers and positions, including executive branch political appointees, senior officers, and top research scientists.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a gradual increase in the rate of pay of certain offices and positions in the executive and judicial branches, and for other purposes.
